metadata.title: CVE-2024-2611 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A missing delay on when pointer lock was used could have allowed amalicious page to trick a user into granting permissions. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 124, Firefox ESR < 115.9, and Thunderbird <115.9.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
